cards.name: Command: Destroy
cards.description:
Retain.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Feed The Bear
cards.description:
Give him some energy.
Play as much as you like.

cards.name: Godly Powers
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Gain [E].
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: The Drybear
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
A full stomach doesn't stop him from chomping down everything that fits in his mouth.

cards.name: The Dryhound
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
An emaciated canine from the Drywoods, he's always hungry.

cards.name: The Maniac
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
A vicious gremlin that becomes angrier whenever its friend is hurt.

cards.name: The Mechanic
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
An inventive gremlin that has spent its life tinkering with Orb technology.

cards.name: The Oracle
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
A wise gremlin that prefers a patient approach to combat.

cards.name: The Outcast
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
An unwanted gremlin that tries its best to help out.

cards.name: The Spy
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
A deadly gremlin that can use anything you give it to great effect.

cards.name: The Vulchyr
cards.description:
lonelymod:Companion.
An evil being that drains power from its master to destroy their enemies.

cards.name: Command: Attack
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.

cards.name: Command: Protect
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.

cards.name: Command: Special
cards.description:
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Special.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Command: Copy
cards.description:
If the last card played this combat was:
An Attack, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.
A Skill, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect. (A Power, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Special.)

cards.name: Command: Target
cards.description:
Apply 3 lonelymod:Target.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.
Add 1 Command: Destroy (+) to your hand.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Heel!
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.

cards.name: Sic!
cards.description:
(Apply 1) lonelymod: (Target to a random enemy.lonelymod:)
Call lonelymod:Attack.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Action Plan
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.
Next turn, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack (and draw 1 card).

cards.name: Adapt
cards.description:
Gain 5 (7) Block.
Draw 1 card.
If you play the drawn card this turn, gain 5 (7) Block.

cards.name: Devious Ploy
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
lonelymod:Plan 2 (3).
Next turn, Gain [E].

cards.name: Distracted
cards.description:
Gain 4 (7) Vigor.
Next turn, lose [E] and add an Overreaction to your hand.

cards.name: Forgetful
cards.description:
Gain 3 (6) lonelymod:Stamina.
Next turn, draw 1 less card and add a Panic Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Help!
cards.description: At the end of your next 2 (3) turns, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.

cards.name: Kill!
cards.description:
Deal 10 (15) damage.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.
At the start of your next 2 turns, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.

cards.name: Long Shot
cards.description: Deal 7 (9) damage. Deal 5 (7) more damage if played on the furthest away enemy.

cards.name: Marker
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Apply 2 (3) lonelymod:Target.

cards.name: Occult Practice
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Strength this turn.
Shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overpower
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
If the enemy intends to deal less damage than your Block, apply 2 (3) Weak.

cards.name: Overthrow
cards.description:
Deal 9 (11) Damage.
If you have no energy, apply 2 (3) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pincer Attack
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
If your lonelymod:Companion intends to lonelymod:Attack, deal 8 (10) damage again.

cards.name: Planned Assault
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Whenever you lonelymod:Plan, move this card from the draw pile to your hand.

cards.name: Pure Skill
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Vigor.
Gain 2 (3) lonelymod:Stamina.
lonelymod:Plan 1 (2).

cards.name: Siphon
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
Gain Vigor equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Stand Strong
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Strike Back
cards.description:
Deal 8 (12) damage.
If you have a debuff, gain [E].

cards.name: Volley
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage to ALL enemies.
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.description:
Deal 13 (17) damage to ALL enemies.
Choose a card in your discard pile to lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Broken Dreams
cards.description:
Shuffle a Misery into your draw pile.
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Gain 3 Weak.

cards.name: Broken Heart
cards.description:
Add an Outburst to your hand.
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Gain 3 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Broken Spirit
cards.description:
Put (Add) a Primal on (to) ~~- top of  -~~ your draw pile (hand).
Grant 2 Strength.
Gain 3 Frail.

cards.name: Chasing Fantasies
cards.description:
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.
lonelymod:Plan 4 (6).
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Consideration
cards.description:
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.
 (Grant 3 Vigor.)
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Next turn, gain Strength equal to double its cost (+ 1).

cards.name: Endless Onslaught
cards.description:
Deal 9 (10) damage.
When you lonelymod:Plan, increase its damage by 3 (4) this combat.
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Fear The Beast
cards.description: Whenever you lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack, gain 5 (7) Block.

cards.name: Fetch!
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Apply 1 lonelymod:Target.
Next time your lonelymod:Companion lonelymod:Attacks, grant 3 (4) Strength.

cards.name: Fiery Arrow
cards.description:
Deal 12 (14) damage.
At the start of the enemy's next 3 turns, deal 6 (7) damage.

cards.name: Genius
cards.description:
lonelymod:Plan 3 (4).
Upgrade selected cards for the rest of combat.
Gain 5 (7) lonelymod:Stamina.

cards.name: Improvise
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Skills of any color to add into your hand.
 (It costs 0 this turn.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Multi-Shot
cards.description: Whenever you play an attack, deal 3 damage to a random enemy 2 (3) times.

cards.name: On Guard
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) lonelymod:Stamina.
If any enemy intends to Attack, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect and lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: On The Hunt
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
If this deals 7 (10) or more unblocked damage, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack and lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Overcome
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, gain 6 Block for every debuff you have.

cards.name: Overflowing Quiver
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 4 damage.
Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile. (lonelymod:Return.)

cards.name: Overreaction
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 3 (6) Block.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Panic Attack
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 4 (7) damage to a random enemy.
Gain [E] [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pin Down
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage this turn, apply 1 lonelymod:Target (,)  (Vulnerable) and Vulnerable (Weak).

cards.name: Plan B
cards.description: Whenever you lonelymod:Plan, gain 2 (3) Vigor for each card you didn't select.

cards.name: Prevail
cards.description:
Gain 10 (12) Block.
At the start of your next 3 turns, gain 5 (6) Block.

cards.name: Recovery
cards.description: Whenever you lonelymod:Call a lonelymod:Move while your lonelymod:Companion intends to lonelymod:Protect, gain [E].

cards.name: Relax
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Lose all your Block.
For every 5 Block lost, gain [E].

cards.name: Single Out
cards.description:
Apply 3 (4) lonelymod:Target.
Gain 6 (8) Block for every enemy in combat.

cards.name: Suppress
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage to a random enemy X times.
Gain 4 (6) Block X times.

cards.name: Teamwork
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.
Grant 2 (3) Dexterity.

cards.name: Twisted Chant
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 3 (4) Strength this turn. Put a Dazed into your discard pile.
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Two Steps Ahead
cards.description: Whenever you lonelymod:Plan, lonelymod:Plan 2 (3) more.

cards.name: Unwavering
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 10 (13) plus ALL enemy's combined Strength in Block.
lonelymod:Return.

cards.name: Vent Frustration
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [E] for every lonelymod:Move you called this turn.
Deal 7 (9) damage 3 times.

cards.name: Wicked Talons
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage twice.
Gain 2 Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Abandon
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Lose 10 (7) HP.
Remove 1 card in your hand from your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accursed Beak
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
Lose 1 Strength this turn.
If you have Strength, play this again.

cards.name: Against All Odds
cards.description:
Deal 26 (34) damage to ALL enemies.
If you have 20 HP or less, gain [E] [E] [E].

cards.name: Bravery
cards.description: At the start of your turn, if ALL enemies intend to attack, gain 12 Vigor (and draw 1 card).

cards.name: Counterstrike
cards.description: Deal the same damage printed on this enemy's current intent.

cards.name: Cycle
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
All cards that will lonelymod:Return are lonelymod:Returned to your hand.

cards.name: Defy Death
cards.description:
You cannot die this turn. Next turn,
draw 3 (4) cards and
gain [E] [E] [E] ( [E]).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Desperation
cards.description: At the end of your turn, play ~~- and exhaust  -~~ a random, non Ethereal card from your hand.

cards.name: Exponential Force
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
If this doesn't kill an enemy, double its damage this combat.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Your lonelymod:Companion lonelymod:Attacks X times on its next turn, and ignores lonelymod:Calls until then.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Grand Scheme
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Discard your draw pile.
lonelymod:Plan your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lonely
cards.description:
Choose a card to play: Bravery, Desperation, Resolve.
Every 16th card you play has no effect.

cards.name: Misery
cards.description:
Whenever you gain Block this turn,
deal 3 (5) damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 10 (12) Block.

cards.name: Muscle Memory
cards.description: Whenever your cards lonelymod:Return, gain [E].

cards.name: Omen
cards.description:
lonelymod:Summon lonelymod:Omen.
lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Special.
Lose 4 (3) Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Outburst
cards.description:
Play (Choose) a (an) ~~- random  -~~ attack from your discard pile (.)
 (Play it) 3 times and exhaust it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Primal
cards.description:
(Perform your Companion's) lonelymod: (Move.lonelymod:)
Call lonelymod:Special.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resolve
cards.description: The first time you lose HP each turn, gain 2 Dexterity ( and 3 lonelymod:Plated lonelymod:Armor).

cards.name: Wild Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Whenever you lonelymod:Call a lonelymod:Move, perform the previous lonelymod:Move.

relics.name: Bones' Stomach
relics.description: At the start of combat, Summon Bones.
relics.flavorText: Given as a sign of trust, it has always been this empty.

relics.name: Box Of Treats
relics.description: Whenever a Companion is Summoned, Grant it 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Every time you open this, another treat lies within.

relics.name: Paper Daug
relics.description: Enemies with Target take 100% more damage from Companions rather than 50%.

relics.name: Short Leash
relics.description: At the start of combat, Call Protect.
relics.flavorText: Keep your friends close, and your enemies will be sure to keep their distance.

relics.name: Boomerang
relics.description: The first card you play each turn will Return to your hand next turn.
relics.flavorText: There seems to be no way to get rid of it.

relics.name: World Map
relics.description: At the end of your turn, after discarding your cards, Plan 4.
relics.flavorText: "A well-documented map can do wonders for one's sense of direction." - The Architect

relics.name: Gift of God
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Godly Powers into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: You may have this power, but not what you hoped to obtain through it.

relics.name: Meat's Stomach
relics.description:
Replaces Bones' Stomach.
At the start of combat, Summon Meat.
relics.flavorText: You changed his name to something more fitting.

relics.name: Spyglass
relics.description: Whenever you Plan X while your discard pile is empty, Scry X + 3 instead.

potions.name: Canned Meat
potions.description: Grant your Companion 3 Strength and 3 Dexterity.

potions.name: Special Sauce
potions.description: Your Companion performs its Special move immediately.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: Creatures with Plated Armor gain Block at the end of their turn. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.

keywords.name: Attack
keywords.description: Move: Focuses on dealing damage to enemies.

keywords.name: Blirt
keywords.description: A tinkering gremlin who loves all kinds of automatons. Her Moves are mainly focused on channeling orbs for you.

keywords.name: Bones
keywords.description: A loyal companion, with an insatiable appetite. Has many ways of improving its Attack Move.

keywords.name: Companion Move
keywords.description:
Tell your Companion to perform this Move at the end of your turn.
Calling another Move will override this Move.

keywords.name: Dzil
keywords.description: A cunning gremlin who loves killing things quietly. Play your Shiv cards on him to improve his next Attack.

keywords.name: Default
keywords.description:
Move: The weakest Move.
Companions will default to performing this Move on their turn.

keywords.name: Fring
keywords.description: A sad gremlin with nothing but a spear. Give him your attention, and he can become a mighty warrior.

keywords.name: Kharn
keywords.description: A mostly insane gremlin, he has recognized your demonic powers and worships you for them. Gains Strength whenever you lose HP.

keywords.name: Meat
keywords.description: An immense beast, a formidable defense. It has lost neither its loyalty nor its appetite.

keywords.name: Omen
keywords.description: A powerful creature, able to destroy all who oppose you. Grant it Strength, and watch its Attack shred through your foes.

keywords.name: Sowru
keywords.description: A patient gremlin who eagerly awaits your command to attack. Her Protect Move will cause you to Enter Calm.

keywords.name: Plan
keywords.description:
Look at the top X cards on your discard pile.
You may choose any of them to shuffle into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Protect
keywords.description: Move: Focuses on granting you Block or weakening enemies.

keywords.name: Return
keywords.description: Return this card to your hand at the start of next turn.

keywords.name: Summon
keywords.description: Replaces the current Companion with a new one. The first time a Move Calling card enters combat, a Gremlin Companion will automatically be Summoned.

keywords.name: Special
keywords.description:
Move: The most powerful Move.
Effects vary greatly between Companions.

keywords.name: Stamina
keywords.description: Your next Block Card gains additional Block.

keywords.name: Target
keywords.description:
Targeted creatures take 50% more damage from Companions.
Companions will prioritize enemies with the most Target.

mods.name: LonelyMod
mods.description: Adds The Lonely as a playable Character. Intended to be the logical complement to The Watcher as the 5th base game character.
